summary: A 19-year-old girl prepares to become a suicide bomber in Times Square. She speaks with a nondescript American accent, and it's impossible to pinpoint her ethnicity. We never learn why she ... See full summary »
cast: Luisa Williams|Josh Philip Weinstein|Gareth Saxe|Nyambi Nyambi|Frank Dattolo|Annemarie Lawless|Teo Yoo|Richard Morant|Jennifer Camilo|Rosemary Apolinaris|Jennifer Restrepo|Julissa Perez|Anthony Dhani|Orlando S. Gondar|JoJo Shaffer
title: Day Night Day Night
